law.catch_line: In this subtitle the following words have the meanings indicated....

text.section: In this subtitle the following words have the meanings indicated.
"Eligible homebuyer" means an individual who meets the qualifications under § 4-305 of this subtitle.

section.section: "Homebuyer education" means instruction in preparing for homeownership, shopping for a home, getting a mortgage loan, loan closing, and life as a homeowner.

text.section: "Program" means the Down Payment and Settlement Expense Loan Program.
"Program loan" means a loan that the Department makes under this subtitle.

section.section: "Settlement expenses" means money that must be paid at the time of the purchase of real estate.
